milestones.title: Milestone 1: Stop the Bleeding
milestones.description: Fix known issues and add basic safeguards to prevent shipping broken code.

milestones.title: Milestone 2: Validation Layer
milestones.description: Build infrastructure that validates generated code and provides feedback to the generation system.

milestones.title: Milestone 3: Telemetry & Evolution
milestones.description: Capture generation events and build the foundation for self-improvement, including ability to propose fixes to upstream LiveTemplate ecosystem repos.

milestones.title: Milestone 4: Components Integration
milestones.description: Integrate the components library to eliminate template drift.

milestones.title: Milestone 5: Style System
milestones.description: Implement CSS swappability through style adapters.

milestones.title: Milestone 6: Components Evolution
milestones.description: Extend evolution system to improve components alongside lvt kits (all in one repo).

_note: Issues #52-#81 were created on GitHub from this file. See https://github.com/livetemplate/lvt/issues
